biases.name: NEUTRAL
biases.headline: Suoka Electric Corp. strikes continue as negotiations stall.

biases.name: COMPANY
biases.description: The workers are selfishly disrupting the lives of everyone else by refusing to meet the company halfway.
biases.headline: Outages continue and lives are ruined by Suoka Electric Corporation strike.

biases.name: WORKERS
biases.description: The company must accept the worker's demands, or else the strike has to continue for the sake of their work conditions.
biases.headline: Suoka Electric Corp. fails to meet striking workers' demands.
